title: Exceptional
positive_txt: Hidden gem next to the airport,if you are looking for something lively keep looking,but if you appreciate quiet after or before your travels this is your place. title: Marvellous villa
positive_txt: We had a fantastic experience with Villa Blue Lotus. The whole villa was amazing and well designed. We stayed in king room and deluxe double room with marvellous view on the palms in the garden. The rooms were spacious and clean. The staff were incredibly kind, helpful, friendly and made our stay very pleasant. We enjoyed relaxing atmosphere a beautiful surroundings. We can highly recommend visiting it.

title: A real gem!
positive_txt: This place is an absolute gem. We needed a place to stay after arriving to airport late, before getting onto another flight the next morning, and this was just perfect. Only a 10 minute drive away but you don't feel like you're near the airport at all - no noise from planes, but a gorgeous villa in rural Sri Lanka with a lovely pool, sun beds, and very comfortable beds/rooms.
negative_txt: It would have been great if they offered food.

title: Gun jezelf twee dagen in deze villa, met een boek en een duik in het zwembad.
positive_txt: Wauw! ‚ÄúThis is your home now‚Äù, kreeg ik te horen bij binnenkomst. En zo voelde het ook. Wat een service en de kosten vielen me ontzettend mee. Na drie weken Sri Lanka, in soms basic of vieze accomodaties en ook weleens met minder attente mensen, was dit precies hoe ik hoopte mijn reis af te sluiten. Helemaal relaxed door de ligbedjes en massage en met 2 kilo extra op mijn heupen aan heerlijk eten verlaat ik dit mooie land.
